scripts.start: npm run build && npm run dev
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run copy-project && cd dist && npm ci && npm run dist:copy && node ./build-docs.mjs
scripts.dist:copy: npm run dist:copy:readmes && npm run dist:copy:lume
scripts.dist:copy:readmes: cp node_modules/element-behaviors/README.md ./guide/includes/lume-element-behaviors.md && cp node_modules/@lume/element/README.md ./guide/includes/lume-element.md && cp node_modules/@lume/variable/README.md ./guide/includes/lume-variable.md && cp node_modules/@lume/autolayout/README.md ./guide/includes/lume-autolayout.md
